about.title: Data Analyst | ML & BI Enthusiast
paragraphs: EDA, descriptive analytics, data cleaning, preprocessing, and visualization with a strong foundation in statistics.
Hands-on with Python (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit‑learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Yellowbrick), SQL, and BI tools including Power BI and Excel.

projects.title: Customer Analysis & Recommendation System
projects.description: Transformed UK retail transaction data into customer-centric views; performed segmentation with K‑Means and built recommendations for cross‑sell of unpurchased items.

projects.title: Iris Recognition (Daugman’s Algorithm + ANN)
projects.description: Implemented iris recognition pipeline, feature extraction, and hyperparameter tuning to improve accuracy; experimented with ANN models.

projects.title: Android Malware Detection (ML)
projects.description: Built models (SVM, Neural Network) to classify Android malware; compared grid search vs. random search for hyperparameter optimization.

projects.title: DHRITI – Capstone Website (Group‑9)
projects.description: Implemented Notifications model/API (mark‑as‑read workflow), responsive navbar and layouts, and front‑end validations. Stack: React + Bootstrap, Node API.
